author: Moop Bread

text: +Moop Bread why? His original is forte which is a musical term which means loud. His dog is called gospel and in english is Treble. So the names are all sound based. Even megaman his original name is rockman which if you look that up it is a refernece to rock music...his sister is named roll. Rockman and Roll rock n roll. Japanese like to do that for some reason...like in bakuretsu hunter (sorcerer hunters in usa) the characters are all named after food. In other series you similar trends.

text:
I have to admit Forte (Bass) has an edge over Rock (Mega Man) in this game. Even though he doesn't get the Auto-Healing item, unlike Rock.

Besides, I found Gospel Boost was a somewhat fun alternative to riding the life-rafts across the water in this stage. ^_^;
